entry.title: Fertile XY - Herbal fertility remedy for men improves sperm count
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Fertile XY is formulated especially for men as a herbal fertility tonic. When a couple are trying to fall pregnant, Fertile XY for Men can assist by supporting male reproductive health, healthy sperm and testosterone production and a strong sex drive.  (50 ml)

  • Improves the functioning of male sexual organs (prostate, seminal vesicles, testes, penis)
  • Increases sperm production, improves sperm motility and health
  • Boosts testosterone levels
  • Counteracts the effects of free radicals on sperm health
  • Increases sex drive, strengthens erections and encourages greater sexual pleasure

Ingredients

Fertile XY is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of Fertile XY are: 

Epimedium grandiflorum (also known as Yin Yang Huo or Horny Goat Weed), Centella Asiatica (also known as Gotu Cola), Tribulus terristis (also known as Gokshura), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

    Directions

    Fertile XY comes in convenient concentrated drop form which is easy to take. 

    Dosage: Take 15 - 20 drops in appr. 1/4 glass water or juice three times daily. For maximum effect, use as part of a healthy lifestyle, diet and exercise program. 

    Feelgood Health Tip!

    Use Fertile XX (for women) together with Fertile XY (for men) to optimise male and female reproductive health and increase the chances of healthy conception

          Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Iqawe for Men - Herbal remedy increases male libido & sexual health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Iqawe for Men is a unique combination of herbs formulated to address the causes of low libido and male sexual dysfunction. Its powerful aphrodisiac properties also help to boost sexual desire and enhance performance, leading to a healthier sex life. Iqawe means "Warrior" or "Strong" in Xhosa
  • Boosts sexual arousal, performance and stamina
  • Prevents erectile problems and supports strong healthy erections
  • Increases erect penis size & prevents premature ejaculation
  • Raises sexual energy levels
  • Alleviates anxiety caused by problems in sexual performance
  • Achieves stronger and more pleasurable ejaculation

Ingredients

Iqawe for Men contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: 

Tribulus terristis, Epimedium grandiflorum, (Horny Goatweed), Sabal serrulata (Saw palmetto), Eleutherococcus senticosis (Siberian Ginseng), Smilax ornata (Sarsaparilla),  Glycorrhiza glabra, Kola vera, Ethanol (natural preservative and extracting agent)

Directions

As a herbal tonic for male sexual health, Iqawe should be used regularly for best effect.

Dosage: Take 10 to 15 drops in a little water three times daily. An additional dose can be taken 15 minutes before sex.

NOTE:  Iqawe is best used in combination with a healthy diet and regular exercise. Avoid excessive smoking and alcohol (especially beer) and do not wear tight trousers or underwear.

Need a female libido booster too? See our Thanda Passion Booster for Women! 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Fertile XX - Herbal Fertility Remedy for women - to promote conception
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Fertile XX is formulated especially for women who are trying to fall pregnant. As a herbal fertility tonic, Fertile XX contains herbs that are well-known for their ability to promote health and balance in the female reproductive system. (50 ml)

  • Promotes healthy and regular ovulation
  • Corrects hormone imbalances underlying infertility
  • Strengthens and tones fallopian tubes & promotes ovarian health
  • Supports healthy uterine functioning & regulates menstrual cycle
  • Boosts libido and sexual pleasure

Ingredients

Fertile XX is formulated according to the principles of Whole Herb Technology, staying true to the Full Spectrum manufacturing principles of herbal medicine. The 100% natural herbal ingredients of Fertile XX are: 

Vitex agnus-castus (Chasteberry), Cimicifuga racemosa (Black Cohosh), 
Eleutherococcus senticosis (Siberian Ginseng), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Fertile XX comes in convenient concentrated drop form which is easy to take. 

Dosage: Take 15 - 20 drops in appr. 1/4 glass water or juice three times daily. For maximum effect, use as part of a healthy lifestyle, diet and exercise program. 

Caution:  Although all the ingredients in Fertile XX are well tolerated and safe, safety in pregnancy has not yet been established. As a precaution it is therefore best for women to stop taking them as soon as conception has taken place.

Feelgood Health Tip!

  • Use Fertile XX (for women) together with Fertile XY (for men) to optimise male and female reproductive health and increase the chances of healthy conception..  
  • Where fertility problems are affected by hormonal conditions such as PCOS (Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome) or Endometriosis, use Fertile XX together with Don Quai for best chances of success. 

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Mojo Pills - For Increased Sexual Energy & Vitality In Men
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Male Health
Price: 144.00

Earth Tribe's Mojo Pills (35 veggie caps) is made from Mondia Whitei root powder (commonly known as African White’s Ginger) and is traditionally used as an aphrodisiac to treat sexual weakness, prevent premature ejaculation and to increase sperm production.

  • Rich in sterols tritapenes, alkaloids, saponins, tarnins, flavanoids, alkaloids, glycosides, phenolds and terpenoids
  • Aids depression and low energy levels
  • High in micronutrients
  • Increases human sperm motility
  • Boosts testosterone levels, stamina and erections

Ingredients

Mondia Whitei root powder in a vegetable capsule.

Directions for use

Take one Mojo Pill in the morning and one in the evening with water.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Thanda Passion Booster - Herbal remedy boosts female sex drive
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 140.00

Specially formulated by a Clinical Psychologist, Thanda is a powerful natural tonic for female sexual health, containing a range of specially selected natural ingredients from the West, Africa and the Orient. Regular use promotes sexual desire and optimal orgasmic functioning. (60 veggie caps)

  • Awakens and enhances female sexual pleasure
  • Natural herbal aphrodisiac to improve sex drive (libido)
  • Increases and promotes orgasmic strength
  • Achieves optimal sexual health and vitality
  • Increases general energy levels and reduces fatigue

Ingredients

Thanda Passion Booster contains the following therapeutic herbs in a 100% vegan friendly vege-capsule.

Gentiana lutea radix powder, Smilax ornata (Sarsaparilla),  NN Diemethylglycine (DMG), Sabal serrulata, Withania somnifera (Ashwaganda, Winter Cherry, Ubuvimbha),Eleutherococcus senticosus (Siberian Ginseng), Ginkgo biloba (Maidenhair), Tribulus terrestris (Puncture Vine), Liriosma ovata (Muira Puama)

    Like all Feelgood Health products, Thanda Passion Booster contains no animal products, gluten, artificial flavours, colours or preservatives and is not tested on animals.

      Directions for use

      Thanda comes in convenient capsule form and should be used regularly for best effect.

      Dosage: Take one to two capsules twice daily after meals. An additional dose can be taken about 10 - 15 minutes before sex to improve the intensity of orgasms. 

      To make sure your man does not feel left out and to keep him in top sexual form, see our Iqawe male libido booster.

      Caution: Safety during pregnancy has not yet been established. 

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Feelgood Health Thanda Passion Booster for Women

entry.title: Fertility Potion Massage Oil | Pure Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 60.50

Pure Indigenous's Fertility Potion (100ml) is an exotic blend of indigenous South African essential oils, made with conception and intimacy in mind!

  • Use to create the perfect atmosphere of love, affection and fertility
  • Cape Chamomile is a calming fynbos essential oil that helps soothe over-active minds and relieve anxiety
  • Cape Rose Geranium reduces stress, aids relaxation and improves mood
  • African Wormwood is a well-known traditional love charm
  • Helichrysum, one of the everlasting family of flowering plants, has been used since ancient times to clear negativity and draw the goodwill of the ancestors
  • African Frankincense is thrown into the exotic mix to further relieve anxiety, balance hormones and improve fertility

Ingredients

Cape Chamomile Essential Oil, Frankincense Essential Oil, Helichrysum Odoratissimum Essential Oil, Cape Rose Geranium Essential Oil, African Wormwood Essential Oil, Grape Seed Oil

Directions for use

To use as a massage oil, pour a liberal amount in the palms of your hand,
warm up the oil by rubbing hands together and then massage into the body. Can also be added to your bath or a burner.
Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. Not to be used by pregnant women.

entry.title: Inala Health Stronga for Men (Umondi) - Libido Tonic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 146.50

Stronga: Umondi Libido Tonic for Men(60 capsules)

Mondia whitei (also known as White's Ginger, Umondi or Mundondo) is a very popular African herb with a wide variety of medicinal uses, the most well-known being as a libido and fertility tonic for men 

  • Traditionally used as an aphrodisiac and libido tonic
  • Promotes male fertility and supports healthy testosterone levels
  • Helps to improve appetite, ease digestion and relieve abdominal pains
  • Also used as a mood tonic and to relieve stress
  • Contains vitamns A, D, K and E as well as magnesium, zinc, iron, calcium and protein and is therefore also used as a strengthening tonic
  • Vegan & vegetarian friendly (veggie tablets) in a recyclable glass bottle

Ingredients

Inala Health Stronga Capsules (contain 100% pure Mondia whitei powder in a vegan friendly capsule.

Directions for use

Use 2 -3 capsules twice daily.
Caution: Please consult your doctor should symptoms persist. Please keep this and all medicines out of reach of children. 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Don Quai Drops: Herbal help for female hormonal balance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Natural Remedy Capsule
Price: 121.50

Don Quai, one of the most important and highly respected Chinese tonic herbs, has been used for centuries by Asian healers as an adaptogen to balance female hormones, assisting with reproductive health, as well as the troublesome symptoms of menopause and PMS. 

  • Relieves the symptoms of menopause and PMS and prevents menstrual cramps
  • Corrects hormone imbalance and prevents estrogen dominance
  • Assists in the treatment of Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome (PCOS)
  • Helps to reduce endometriosis & uterine fibroids
  • Acts as a general tonic for the female reproductive system
  • Reduces high blood pressure (hypertension)

Ingredients

Feelgood Health Don Quai contains only the finest quality 100% pure Angelica sinesis for maximum strength and medicinal effect. It is presented in concentrated tincture form and manufactured according to the Full Spectrum method for maximum effectiveness.  

    Directions for use

    Dosage: Take 15 drops in about 1/4 cup water or juice 2 to 3 times daily. 

    Caution: Safety in pregnancy has not yet been established. 

    Consult your doctor if symptoms persist or worsen.

      Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Endo-Ex - Effective herbal remedy for natural treatment of endometriosis
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Herbal Tincture
Price: 121.50

Endo-Ex is a safe and effective natural remedy for endometriosis. Containing herbs known for their liver strengthening and hormone-balancing properties, Endo-Ex helps to relieve the symptoms of stubborn and painful endometriosis, without the risks of side effects often associated with conventional medicine and surgery. (50 ml)

  • Addresses the underlying cause of endometriosis
  • Decreases pelvic inflammation associated with endometriosis
  • Strengthens liver functioning & protects against environmental pollutants
  • Reduces menstrual pain and cramps & regulates the menstrual cycle
  • Prevents diminished fertility in women with endometriosis

Ingredients

Endo-Ex contains the following ingredients in our unique concentrated 100% herbal formula, manufactured according to Whole Herb Technology: ﻿

Vitex agnus-castus,  Angelica senensis (Don Quai), Silybum marianus (Milk Thistle), Dioscorea villosa(Chinese Yam), Viburnum opulus (30C), Ethanol (inactive ingredient)

Directions

Directions:
Take 10 - 15 drops in 1/4 cup water or juice three times daily. Continue for at least 6 months or longer should this be necessary.

Caution:
Please consult your medical practitioner should symptoms persist. Safety during pregnancy and nursing is not yet established.

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
